features: ✅ Compatible With 30 Inch LG Gas Range 5 Gas Burners- The gas stove cover fits for LG gas ranges Models LGLDG4315/LGLDG4315BSS/LGLDG4315BD/LGLDG4315BD00/LGLDG4315SS/LGLDG4315ST00/LGLDG4315ST, LGLRG4115BD/LGLRG4115BD00/LGLRG4115ST/LGLRG4115ST00, LGLRG4113BD/LGLRG4113BD00/LGLRG4113ST/LGLRG4113ST00, LGLDG4313BD/LGLDG4313BD00/LGLDG4313ST/LGLDG4313ST00.

✅ Upgraded 0.4MM Thickness & Non-Toxic Material - Our gas stovetop covers have been enhanced with a 0.4mm double-layer thickness, PTFE coating, and fiberglass, ensuring food-grade quality. They are BPA/PFOA-free, environmentally friendly, and hygienic. Cook confidently on your LG gas stove without any odor or impact.

✅ Ultimate Heat Resistance - Our gas stove burner covers can withstand high temperatures up to 315°C/600℉ for gas stoves and 230°C/446℉ for electric stoves. They provide excellent protection for your cooktop, preventing melting, burning, or deforming. Please avoid direct contact with fire.

✅ Easy to Clean and Reusable - Our non-stick gas stove top guard makes cleaning a breeze. Simply wipe them with a towel during daily use. When they get too dirty, wash them with soap in the sink or dishwasher. They are reusable, saving you time and money on replacements.

✅ Complete Kitchen Protection - You will receive: 1PCS stove mat for LG stove top protector + 2PCS of 25 inch silicone stove counter gap covers + 3PCS cleaning brushes. The stove top guards are fully compatible with gas stoves, and the precise perforations ensure a seamless fit. The stove side gap guards can be trimmed to fit your unique stove and counter setup. Protect your kitchen from spills, stains, and gaps with our comprehensive solution.
body.description: Why Opt for Our Products? PREMIUM THICKNESS Experience the highest quality with our gas stove top liners featuring a premium non-stick coating on both sides, measuring a substantial 0.4mm in thickness—thicker than standard alternatives. This ensures a perfect fit with your stove, without any curling issues. 100% NON-TOXIC & HIGH HEAT RESISTANCE Our stove mats are crafted from materials that are 100% free from BPA, PFOA, ensuring the safety of you and your family. With the capability to withstand temperatures of up to 600F (315°C), these mats effectively protect your stove from potential damage caused by hot pans and pots. COST-EFFECTIVE COMBO KIT Combining the stove top mat with a matching silicone stove counter gap cover. Together, they efficiently catch spills and drips, preventing damage to your stove surfaces. This also safeguards your kitchen from stains, helping to maintain the pristine appearance of your cooktop.Additionally, the kit includes 3 cleaning brushes, ensuring easily tackle tough stains in your kitchen on a daily basis.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable Material Withstands Daily Use
reviews.reviewText: The durability of the material is impressive. It can withstand the daily wear and tear of cooking, providing long-lasting protection for my LG gas range.
